website_summaries.verdict: Good option for bright LED light replacements with more premium features and construction.
pros: Smart headlights work with many different vehicle computer systems
Can adjust beam pattern for the best illumination
cons: Some vehicles might require a separate harness and adapter kit for the correct brightness

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Company and Product!
customer_reviews.text: One of my lights went out after a year of use. But glowteck honored their 2-year warranty and sent me another set free of charge. Excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Way better then HID's, these are super bright!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these last week for the wifes F150, first time ordering LED bulbs as I have always had HID's so of course I was a bit skeptical. But geezes these led's are bright, I am thinking they are brighter than the HIDs installed on my car. Would definitely buy these LED's without a concern next time. Just keep in mind these puppies get hot and need air, so you may not be able to use your dust cover like your stock factory halogen bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Lenix

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars UPDATE 1 star
customer_reviews.text: It's been less than a year and one of the LEDs has lost whatever the clear part is and half that headlight doesn't work. Contacted their warranty deptartment 2 weeks ago and still no reply. BUY AT YOUR OWM RISK.
customer_reviews.author: Breeves

customer_reviews.title: Got the highbeam version and IMMEDIATELY got the regular version as well, that's how bloody good I thought they were....
customer_reviews.text: They say that a picture is worth a thousand words, so here are two, a before and after, the brighter and whiter one is the after, just to be clear.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Greenblatt

customer_reviews.title: Bright, works well and Easy to install!
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for about 2 months now and they have been working great. They are definitely brighter than my old headlights and were also super easy to install. I don't normally work on my car myself, but these were quite easy to install. I was on a few roadtrips over the summer on some dark highways and havent had any issues and was very bright. Would definitely buy another set They're a lot brighter and also make the car look better. I would highly recommend them! My friend's headlight just burnt out, so I told him to order a pair.
customer_reviews.author: john sabo

customer_reviews.title: Looking for an end to bulb replacement.
customer_reviews.text: My 2009 GMC Sierra 2500 HD has had headlight bulbs replaced (6) times in the eight years I have owned it. It is the ultimate pain in the butt to replace the bulbs as you have to remove the intake air box on the passenger side and the battery, battery tray and windshield wiper fluid reservoir on the driver side of the truck to get to the bulbs. Also, the more expensive the incandescent bulb, the shorter the life... I installed the Glowteck LED replacements for hopefully the last time for 40,000 hours of use. I'm impressed with the brightness compared to the previous incandescent bulbs. Thanks guys. The quality looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Merritt

customer_reviews.title: Better lights & for slightly less money then others I've had.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set to replace a set from a DIFFERENT vendor that burnt out in 11 months & wouldn't honor the 3 year warranty. So far I'm very happy with this set from this vendor. Lights definitely are bright & fans are much quieter. Now we'll see if they pass the test of time....
customer_reviews.author: MAX POWER

customer_reviews.title: 2015 Nissan Altima SL 2.5
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: RIP: AUG 2017 - Jan 2019. One of the lights died. 15 min install came with everything I needed, including zip ties! Nice and bright, 0 complaints. Exceeded expectation. Oh the "fan noise" everyone spoke about wasn't even noticeable. I wonder if they upgraded the fans because you seriously can't hear them over the engine sound. Will update if anything goes wrong. Update: 6 months & still going strong. Update: Over 1 1/2 years later, still kicking butt. Nothing wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Rey

customer_reviews.title: Nice and bright!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my 2016 Chevrolet Colorado Z71. The lights are awesome! I had LEDs already but they weren’t very bright. These are much brighter! My only issue is that the passenger side light seems to be aimed in too far to the left. I tried playing around with the bulb to make sure it was seated correctly but the access to my passenger side light is so difficult. For now, I’m assuming it’s not the bulbs fault. I’ll play around some more when I have more time. For the meantime, very satisfied with this bulb kit.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

customer_reviews.title: Clear and makes the road precisely visible
customer_reviews.text: These headloghts are a huge upgrade from the previous bulbs in my car. They illimumate the road so clearly and nicely and make night driving a comfort amd almost preferable. The road becomes perfectly visible at night. I have no worry whatsoever taking a long drive during the night.
customer_reviews.author: hindy goldfinger

customer_reviews.title: Super bright
customer_reviews.text: Thus far these LED lights are as advertised: By far the brightest lights I have ever used with great visibility overall, installation was as easy as regular bulb replacement. Thus far a great buy. Time will prove the next expectation, as the expensive high intensity bulbs I switched from were very faithful in their consistency in burning out at the 3 month mark making them extremely frustrating; having to trade reliability for visibility. This made the 2 year guarantee very welcomed and these lights are much brighter, with better darkness penetration and overall clarity; and less expensive!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory M. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great enhancement to visibilty, extremely clear!!
customer_reviews.text: After having the led conversion kit for a few weeks I have to say how impressed I am with the great visibility it enables. Looking back, at night while driving with my old non led lights it was so unclear, but now with the new leds the roads and curves are so much more clear! Definitely very happy with this purchase. The install literally took under 5 minutes, even for me as a layman!
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: Bright, adjustable, and reliable.
customer_reviews.text: I like these because they adjust with ease. I can't say they'll work well with your car, but they work well in a 2009 Fusion. After I adjusted them to the proper "spill", I have had no issues for over a year now. The price is nice, too.
customer_reviews.author: Thad

customer_reviews.title: Increased safety, bright white light, and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I drive on dark roads and poorly lit roads late at night. After converting my headlights, my drive was so bright and clear! I feel safer and better about driving. My headlights used to give off a faint yellow light (I have a Toyota Camry) and now it’s bright, white light that enhances my light of sight. They were simple to install. I was able to do it myself. I can’t belive I drove for so long without these new lights. I strongly recommend them for safer and enhanced driving.
customer_reviews.author: Mordyman

customer_reviews.title: This kit killed my TIPM, I ended up having  no lights. Buyer beware !!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was told by Amazon this LED kit would work on my 2016 Dodge Ram pickup. After the installation including the anti flicker kit, I had no headlight at all. Even when I reinstalled the Halogen bulbs the lights no longer worked. I had to take the truck to the dealership. They had to replace the TIPM module to the tune of $900. Buyer beware. Amazon is washing their hands of this. Saying I have to deal with the vendor is responsible. Found out the vendor is not based in the US. They have no website or phone number. Very disappointed with Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Herb Heck

customer_reviews.title: No ready to review yet
customer_reviews.text: I cannot fairly review this product just yet. These reviews should be conducted after a year installation. The reason I purchased these is because my previous lights from different vendor failed after 17 months with a 2 year warranty. When trying to make a claim, their page no longer pops up. Since the system will not allow me to move forward without rating longivity, it gets ONE STAR until such time it has met those expectations. If this were to be requested at least a year from now, it would be 5 stars all the way. I love these lights, so far
customer_reviews.author: Aristides Restituyo Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Bright, plug&play, reliable, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Brighter then my 55w HIDs. More reliable then any HID kit because its plug and play. Road salt and winter weather blew out two set of HIDs in the past 5 years; 2 ballasts and one corroded plug. These LEDs have no ground wires or relays or anything other then a ballast and bulb. Customer serive is top notch: had a flicker problem on my 2012 Ram. Glowteck sent free capacitors, recieved in under 48 hours. I would definately buy more of my other vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina K.

customer_reviews.title: WARRANTY IS TRASH
customer_reviews.text: *DO NOT BUY* They are great bulbs until they go out not even 8 months, which isn’t a big deal because things happen, but the “warranty” doesn’t exist. The company won’t get back with you. I’ve been waiting almost a month for a response from them and had to buy new ones. I always buy opt7 but decided to give these a chance and the company is trash.
customer_reviews.author: Blaec

customer_reviews.title: Not the right lights or resistors.
customer_reviews.text: Well packaging and quality looked great but one massive problem. I was excited to install these lights and after the giant pain that the 2014 Ram headlights are they don’t fit even though the amazon parts sizing program said it was the correct fit. So my glow tech lights and the resistors are both incorrect and a waste of my time trying to install. Paid a premium price for worthless nice looking lights. I must add to my review to be fare their customer service has since contacted me trying to make it right. Unfortunately they don’t make the lights my Ram needs.I’m would assume their product is great but call them before ordering to make sure it fits.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Very bright easy install
customer_reviews.text: These things work great. I bought a set of low and high beam for my subaru crosstrek. I put them in and noticed that the beam on the driver side was good and other side was faint. Looked at the orientation of the LED. The one that looked good the LED's were at 9 and 3. Looked at other side and they were at 11 and 5. Here u can orientate the black plastic piece and i moved the others so all the LED's were at 9 and 3. What a difference. The light beams are perfect now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glowteck LED
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used other led headlight bulbs. But they seem not to last long, no more than a year, either one bulb will go out or they will just dim have a shadow aim line. So far I really like the Turquoise Glowteck they are a nice bright white light, and gives out a slight blue tint, payed a little more for the Glowtecks, hopefully these will last for long time. Only thing it took a little while to time and adjust the socket onto the headlight housing on my 2010 Silverado all and all it worked out and looks great. Recommend the Glowteck LED.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo

customer_reviews.title: Fantatic Headlights
customer_reviews.text: i have purchased four different headlights over the past couple months looking for the brightest headlights i can have. These are definitely the best ive bought, ,they work great, very good decision to purchase these light,, they are just as bright as my HIGH beam lights and give me great visibility to watch thr road for deer on my way to work.. thank you
customer_reviews.author: John Hayhurst

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price. I replaced other LED headlights and can finally see at night.
customer_reviews.text: Can’t speak to the longevity of these bulbs since I just installed yesterday but holy crap are they bright! I have a 2016 cx5, the factory halogens sucked and I was having a hard time on the unlit back roads. I switched out to standard led replacements. They were a little better but still had trouble seeing in bad weather or particularly dark areas. Threw these bad boys in and all is well. Will update if they burn out or fail, or if I have trouble in bad weather, but they’re brighter than my high beams. Same type of brightness the luxury HID have in Mercedes or Lexus... EDIT: after almost 1 full year they’re going strong. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: B. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Super bright!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality bright product, makes my camry look even better. It really enhances the look. It also helps when I drive down the dark country roads with no lights. There are many choices when it comes to LED headlights, and I am glad I got this one! Looking forward to replacing the other bulbs on my car with Glowteck!!!
customer_reviews.author: D E

customer_reviews.title: Great LEDs
customer_reviews.text: I did some research and looked into LEDs that were equivalent in lumens to stock halogen bulbs. Started with 6,000 lumen/set bulbs. They felt like I was driving with a headlight out still. Found these at 12k lumens/set. They are awesome! They are as bright as the expensive halogens (that typically last about a year) if not brighter. They have a good and defined cutoff point that does not blind oncoming drivers but fills the entire area up to that point with light. Hopefully they will last 2 years or more. Very happy with them so far and super easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: eman

customer_reviews.title: Like a shining STAR
customer_reviews.text: Finally had the chance to install them on to my wifes' car and they look great. Item is of good quality and easy to install. Lights are white and bright, definitely much brighter than the stock halogen I replaced. Also they included free interior LED bulbs which I installed in the map light, they are bright as well. I was doubtful but they prove to be as good as they advertise. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: FTC

customer_reviews.title: Buy Them!!!
customer_reviews.text: Glowteck LED Headlight Bulbs Conversion Kit - H11(H8/H9)...for a 2010 Toyota Prius Base,"EXCELLENT Upgrade!"No comparison between the Factory OEM Halogen Bulbs and these Jewels!Buy Them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chewbaca

customer_reviews.title: Great product and amazing service
customer_reviews.text: My friend told me about these lights and he was really into them, so I had to try it out. These H11 LED headlight bulb installed onto my 2018 Camry in minutes - truly by yourself installation, with clear instructions. I also found a video online which helped! Also, I found the customer service extremely out to help, and guided me to the exact size. The headlights are amazingly clear, bright and light up black roads! It’s a nice clear white light, which gives me the feel of a brand new car. Overall very impressed!!
customer_reviews.author: Shmuel Gartenhaus

customer_reviews.title: Broken Product
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this product paid $70.88 went to a mechanic to put them on and one light was broke. Unbelievable!! I had to schedule an appointment to have them installed for the mechanic to tell me one was broke! I am livid!!! To top it all off I had to go purchase lights temporarily and had to spend another $40. I am Extremely disappointed with this order
customer_reviews.author: Amaris

customer_reviews.title: Fits all 2011 Malibu
customer_reviews.text: Its say says low beams only but these fit the high beams and fog lights on the 08-12 Chevy Malibu's. These lights are stupid bright! I rarely even need my high beams anymore, and when I do its like day. I love them and anything reflective seems to glow, which is especially great on those dark highways where Johnny law is hiding out. You can see bikers, walkers, DEER, road signs, or the word POLICE floating in the dark a good ways off! Only Con I have is people think your brights are on and will flash you from time to time.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: A great look but not a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: They have worked pretty well so far. I did however have the driver side bulb turn itself off but came straight back on once I turned my lights off then back on. In my 2013 Elantra GT the dust caps to keep moisture out of the housing wouldn't fit back on because of the fans on the back of the lighting unit so I had to resort to paying the extra money for aftermarket bulbous dust caps so everything stays dry. So keep their length in mind based on your vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua T.

customer_reviews.title: Warranty stinks
customer_reviews.text: Installed lights ,worked great until six months from install , one light burnt out jumped through the hoops sent pictures they requested cut the wire on the bad light liked the wanted and still waiting for the warranty replacement another six months still waiting. Terrible customer service warranty is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last... maybe they will make it right ?
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for right about 1 year and then failed. After further inspection o found that the box had an internal solder go bad on the positive input line and pull from the circuit board. I soldered it back but not sure how long it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Collin P.

customer_reviews.title: They cut off randomly
customer_reviews.text: These lights suck. I installed them on my 15 Silverado, they worked great for 10 mins till I’m driving down the road at night and they just cut out. I put my highs in which saved me. Now they cut in and out randomly. I’ll be repacking back to my halogens tomorrow am. I followed the instructions and dont rec. these lights to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Paola

customer_reviews.title: READ THIS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: First off these headlights are amazing for projector lens. As for high beams or reflector lens based on my research this is not a good light for those. For high beams I would recommend to look at nineo led headlights. Other than that the light is very bright and pure white. It’s cool white so depending on how clean or dirty your headlight covers are it can look blueish to yellow. Not too much to affect the overall color though. Installation is not hard just gotta make sure you align everything correctly. The light is 360 adjustable. Works great in storms. For the price you won’t be disappointed I’m very happy I got these.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Super bright
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install very bright replaced my old HID kit from blue so much brighter now with the white LED kit. Extra led bulbs for interior lights a bonus super bright as well. Before and after kit with side by side with old an new. Plus both led lights picture
customer_reviews.author: Carlos caez

customer_reviews.title: getting what I pay for
customer_reviews.text: I think that the lights were of poor quality and was not worth the price at all very disappointed had led lights already called myself upgrading to better lights and in all actuality I was downgrading and spending more money for what was suppose to have been better lights
customer_reviews.author: gile hunter

customer_reviews.title: Good product and even better customer
customer_reviews.text: I loved the brightness of these bulbs. However they only lasted 6 months. I'm not satisfied with this set and maybe it was just a bad batch. I have reached out to glowteck about returning this item and we will see how that goes. They come with a 2 year warranty and if handled correctly I will change my review. Update...I reached out to glow teck and my new replacement lights were sent out immediately, I recieved them in 4 days from the time I first reached out to them. You can't ask for better service than that. Thanks, Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.author: Adam McDowell

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Got these for 2015 Ram 3500. Easy install much better than traditional factory lights. Got the low beams and they’re super bright, you will not be dissatisfied. I don’t know how long they last because I just installed them, but they are great. I will get these on my Jeep as well.
customer_reviews.author: Calistror

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product! You can not go wrong purchasing this item!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this brand for my 2016 Ram 1500. Installation was very easy, considering all you have to go through to change a light on the Ram 1500. Lights are very bright! High recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Talo Running-Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Bright, reliable, and would suggest them to anyone.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set of Glowteck bulbs I've purchased. I now run highs and lows in my 2008 Silverado 2500HD. I used a cheaper brand for my lows when I bought my 1st couple of pairs for the truck and the knockoffs died on me but the high beams (Glowtecks from beginning, over 2 years old now, are still going strong). These new Glowtecks are going to complete my set. Wicked bright, and the 1st set was super reliable, keep them coming Glowtecks.
customer_reviews.author: BRANDON WILLARD

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit, Customer service did not know what they were talking about
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2013 Kia Optima. The wiring did not fit my car. Customer service was patronizing, to say the least. They say it fits, I offered to send pictures of the wiring...of course, that 'wasn't necessary'.
customer_reviews.author: Business Connections/Richard T.  Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great while they last
customer_reviews.text: These headlights are super bright and work great, until they don’t. One of the headlights went out in under a year. My wife loves the way they work, but for this much money I’d expect to get more than 11 months out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Ron C

customer_reviews.title: Great LED conversion kit!
customer_reviews.text: Headlights are great! I can see better and way further than standard lights! They are brighter than the HID kit I had installed before I put this kit in and they are instantly bright no more waiting for them to warm up. I had issues with my 2014 Chevy Silverado because of the Canbus system but Glowteck sent me the capacitors I needed to make them work for free! Great customer service and a great product! Highly recommend this LED kit.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Super bright and amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I put these in my 2017 Ford Fusion SE. I did a lot of research before buying a set of any LED lights bec I wanted a good pair. I came across these! And let me tell you they are absolutely amazing and super bright! I would highly recommend these lights to anyone! They won’t let you down promise you that! You can’t even hear the fan running at all with these! They need to make a high beam for these that would be awesome as well! Customer service is amazing also they are very friendly and quick responses and will help with anything you need!
customer_reviews.author: Chad Harrigan

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect with my 4Runner 2012
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect with my 4Runner 2012. You just have to use the original rubber gasket and remove the gasket from the new LED light. Installed on 03/31/2017. I will come back later with update. For now it's a five. 4/23/17 very bright on the dark highway. Don't even need high beam. 5/17/17 so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: ... these to try to help the vehicle with the worst headlights I have ever seen and working in the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to try to help the vehicle with the worst headlights I have ever seen and working in the automobile collision field for 40 yrs . I will say it is a 2014 KIA Optima it has helped the light field better but the distance was not affected but that is a design fault. I plan to buy another set for my truck. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in 2 years
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working within 2 years. So just plan on that.
customer_reviews.author: Waqas

customer_reviews.title: Awesome upgrade!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Installed on my 2011 fusion and they are amazing. Difficult to install on my car but not the products fault. My headlights are extremely difficult to get to. Planning to buy the high beams next and hi and lo for my wifes town and country. I expected flicker or something odd being led but I havent had any issue what so ever.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew F.

customer_reviews.title: They're alright.
customer_reviews.text: I think the problem I have with these light is more of a problem that Subaru designed a louse headlight lens than these being bad lights. I have a 2011 Subaru Impreza and bought these lights because the OEM lights just didn't illuminate the road very well. The factory lights have a very sharp cutoff. Well, even though these lights are brighter, they don't reach out any further.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin  Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are very high quality! Ford Fusion is one of the most difficult installations there is. However, it is well worth the effort! (There are plenty of YouTube videos detailing it). And the adjustable beam is a real plus.
customer_reviews.author: av8r

customer_reviews.title: The flickering
customer_reviews.text: Nice and bright product. Any negative thing is the flickering. Haven’t seen any part like a resistor glowtech provides. Any help?
customer_reviews.author: Danny Sangco

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong with this kit.
customer_reviews.text: After an extensive research I bought the glowteck LEDs and I couldn't be happier with them. Nice packaging, everything is as advertised and so easy to install. The difference on the road is remarkable, during the nights I only turn the fog lights on with the LEDs and that's it, I see everything. I posted a picture with the before and after, it doesn't look that bright in the picture but believe me, when you are behind the wheel and turn them on you see a big difference, also it looks awesome and the 6k kit it matches perfectly the DRL LEDs on my 19 tacoma. You can't go wrong with this kit. 5*
customer_reviews.author: Luis Colmenares

customer_reviews.title: Bright and White
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headlights for my brother's Accord after I got into a bit of an accident while driving it. And I gotta say that he has since completely forgiven me!! They give off a really radiant white light which improves visibility immensely. Especially where we live in Pennsylvania since there aren't many street lamps. Definitely got my money's worth!!!
customer_reviews.author: Yitzhak E Fink

customer_reviews.title: Great bulbs
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, very bright, and after almost a year, still going strong. Going to buy another set for another vehicle soon. Good job Glowteck.
customer_reviews.author: tiredmom

customer_reviews.title: Bright and annoying!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to install, very bright. but those little fans are super annoying and very noisy. They are so strong, it vibrate the car and it doesn't shut off after very long period of time. You must lock the car or turn it off. Putting the car on standby mode won't work..They are tiny but super annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Sze Ching Mao

customer_reviews.title: If install is easy, these are worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Easy install process. Arrived quick and as described. Customer service was amazing. 2 year warranty is nice. Cons: Longevity is terrible. In one year I’ve replaced each side. Within the last week both sides have burned out for the second time. (Front bumper has to be removed for install)
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable.
customer_reviews.text: One of my h11s burned out after only 6 months of minimal use I thought LEDS were supposed to be more durable than halogens. On the other hand these things are really bright I just wish they had lasted longer for the nearly $70 I paid.
customer_reviews.author: jacob

customer_reviews.title: Great LED lights!
customer_reviews.text: very bright and easy to install. Great little upgrade that makes a world of difference and also looks very modern.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set of lights !!!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 3 sets of this lights. 2 for a Honda Pilot and 1 for a odyssey. After about a year and a half these are working great with no issues. Nice bright white light, in dark roads it illuminates very far and they’re easy to install. What’s there not to like.
customer_reviews.author: Wilson F.

customer_reviews.title: super brite
customer_reviews.text: Super Brite headlites , EZ to install , had a problem customer service right on top of it fixed in a day . Will buy again when I get ready to do hi beams. THANKS ..
customer_reviews.author: bee zee

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit 10 Chevy Tahoe
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. But it does not fit a 2010 Tahoe. The fan housing is too long and hits the wall behind it when trying to tighten back to frame. With that being said when I was trying to put it back together I ended up braking the flanges on the light housing.... so now I get to buy a whole new headlight setup. And I overnighted it. Sad day.
customer_reviews.author: Sterling Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very nice change in brightness. The LED lights are very solid and heavy, they feel really well built. These lights are definitely well worth the money. I put them into my 2015 Ram 2500. They didn’t work at first, but Anna with their customer service sent me a fix at no additional cost due to the lights not always working with Rams.
customer_reviews.author: Josh S.

customer_reviews.title: Much easier to install on my Prius than the HID ...
customer_reviews.text: Much easier to install on my Prius than the HID headlights I bought previously. I understand that they will remain a bright white light until they quit working, unlike the HID headlights that got dimmer as they aged.
customer_reviews.author: Inspector Gadget Too

customer_reviews.title: wow!  Bright!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced our headlights on our Dodge 3500 with the Gloteck LED Headlights and what an amazing difference! We can see while driving at night and at poor light levels. They made a huge difference. Oncoming cars are NOT high beaming us either, that was a concern. They came quickly and were packaged well. Very much satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Wetzel

customer_reviews.title: NOPE!
customer_reviews.text: DOES NOT FIT TOYOTA TUNDRA! The housing (fan) is 2+ inches longer than a standard bulb housing and does NOT fit in the Tundra. Front end support pillars are too close. Waste of time and money, since there was a "promise to fit" ...and it didn't.
customer_reviews.author: Chantel Corriveau

customer_reviews.title: Damaged bulb.
customer_reviews.text: So I ordered these and had help installing them. After installing them we come to find that one bulb was damaged. Uninstalled it and reordered a new set going to install them here I'm a day. If they are damaged again then all reviews will be one star. EDIT- Tried second set still didnt work one light turned on. Other did turn on but for only 5 seconds. Will be returning.

customer_reviews.title: Good lights for this price
customer_reviews.text: Required splicing in for Kia forte '11. Connectors are not compatible. Easy enough to do, but was not plug and play for this specific car. Otherwise no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: M. LeClair

customer_reviews.title: worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a very solid product that will last a long time and they are very bright,, don't like that it has to use ballasts that get in the way of putting dust cap back on but I understand why they are used and not a deal breaker, would Definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dillion white

customer_reviews.title: Great product but NOT plug and play
customer_reviews.text: Definitely NOT plug and play for the 2009 Kia Optima LX as was described. After splicing though they work well
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great product so far
customer_reviews.text: Great lights. They plugged right in. I don’t know about the longevity of the product yet but if they last as long as they say they will, I’ll be sure to buy them again and as soon as my wife’s car needs new bulbs these bad boys are going on. It is a bit bulky but can easily by muscled into place. Extremely adjustable for any vehicle. They are super bright so they would probably kill vampires. # team Jacob.
customer_reviews.author: Justin C

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: The crisp, bright white of these headlights makes night driving safer and more enjoyable. They strike the perfect balance of illuminating the road clearly while not blinding other drivers.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle Koval

customer_reviews.title: Check vehicle!  Compatibility
customer_reviews.text: Great led lights !very bright! And visibility is awesome at night! ... installing was very simple and quick ‘! In my case I need it extra cable ,for the led work in my truck they shipped at no cost .. for my 15 1500 Silverado.. make sure you ask if it fits and works on your vehicle! Before purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Proven product and bad pattern can see on the road.
customer_reviews.text: I had received this product, it was broken I try to put on but it getting loose anyway if it is a good patterns light I would just return and reorder it but the pattern is not watch I expected can see on the road as well due to the high price, I would say its price should be under $40.
customer_reviews.author: Pao Vue

customer_reviews.title: This product is a 5+ in my book
customer_reviews.text: A little snug getting them in my 2008 silverado... But let me tell you that I can can read a news paper at 100ft from my truck... Crystal clear white light and with the focal adjustment you see but don't blind the oncoming traffic... I highly recommend this product for everyone.. 5+ in my book
customer_reviews.author: major pain 2

customer_reviews.title: Bright lights
customer_reviews.text: We have bought 3 different pairs of these for all our vehicles. We love them! I can actually see while I'm driving at night time now. In 2 of my cars the lights are just always on and people are always checking our lights out! Worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Cdm1612

customer_reviews.title: Fit my Lexus CT200h 2012
customer_reviews.text: Easy install, not as bright as my old HID’s but it does the job. My head lights are projectors so I do see two vertical light beams on the projectors up close. Not a big deal but something to consider before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: KenMe

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These fit perfect. Easy to install. So far they are working great.
customer_reviews.author: T. W.

customer_reviews.title: Bright and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I bought these several months ago and they were a breeze to install. No focusing needed. Bright white light. Cool light blue reflection in headlights in daylight when off
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Works great, ask glowtek for assistance if needed.
customer_reviews.text: Used this on my 2012 Ford Focus. High quality product. Looks exactly as the picture shows, and plugs directly into the factory wiring harness. The only problem I experienced was that the lights would turn off when the engine started, but with some help from Anna from glowtek, she was able to send me some capacitors free of charge, which completely fixed the problem. They now work flawlessley, And i have had no issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Very friendly and helpful staff! 2yr. Warranty!
customer_reviews.text: These headlights work amazing! Super bright! I definitely recommend buying these headlights or anything from Glowteck for that matter. I had issues at first because my vehicle needed capacitors so I emailed glowteck about my issue and they got back to me right away and helped me out big time! Thanks to Anna from Glowteck for making everything possible. I’ll definitely buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ohl

customer_reviews.title: Very bright
customer_reviews.text: I tested these and they were very bright. Only downside - they did not fit my headlight assembly. The base of it was too bulky and had to order a different style bulb.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Nice and bright!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to use for a long drive across 4 State's, driving at night in dark areas helped a lot. Looking into purchasing the low beams as I already had some other brand installed and aren't bright enough. I highly recommend. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Md_Bro

customer_reviews.title: 2015 f150 awesome bright head lights.
customer_reviews.text: These are very bright just added to my 2015 f150. Glad I didn't get any high beam LEDs cause these are bright enough. Highly reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: LAW_MAN

customer_reviews.title: Good brightness, but melted down in 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: I used these guys for about 6 months. They looked great and weren’t too hard to install. A few days ago the left one went out. Yesterday the right one went out. I took them out to see what’s up and the little led bulbs were totally busted- or maybe even melted? These bad boys didn’t even last as long as halogen bulbs, let alone as long as LEDs should. Can’t recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Allison J Boggess

customer_reviews.title: Bright, long lasting and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Awesome set of LED lights, nice and bright, easy to install and last a long time. My wife and I both use these.
customer_reviews.author: Colton Laimond

customer_reviews.title: Headlights
customer_reviews.text: Didnt work for my car, the company did try to help! Just couldn't find what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Siemering

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Although the lights didn't work for my application, Glowtech has remarkable customer service, and tried many ways to resolve my issues with the lights. Ultimately I regretted sending them back, but was promptly refunded for my purchase. The lights were bright and worked as described, in the future I'll buy new headlight buckets that will accommodate the lights and adjustments I am looking for. Thank you Glowtech for working with me on everything.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Super Bright
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Great communication. Haven’t been able to use them yet in complete darkness yet but I can tell they are very bright.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Kestler

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding performance and value
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding performance and value in comparison to competitors. My headlights have been transformed into particle cannons of light, really couldn't be happier with the purchase. Takes a second to get them adjusted properly and into the lens but then just zip tie up the power adapter and your good to go. Will be upgrading all my vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: K. Louis

customer_reviews.title: Great kit!
customer_reviews.text: Glowteck has better LED conversion kits than anyone in the market. Trust me - ive been through so many of them. After spending the last few months with these i can honestly say this is the best option out there. Couldn't have been happier!
customer_reviews.author: Israel Rozenberg

customer_reviews.title: BRIGHT!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Super bright!! Tried a lot of LED bulbs and these are hands down the brightest so far 💯. Got them in 3 different vehicles now and just had a bulb go out after 1 year and they have a new bulb headed my way now free of charge under warranty
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy B.

customer_reviews.title: Easty to install and very bright!!
customer_reviews.text: I dont do this often but this is the best available low beam led headlight and very easy to install ( took me 10min) i believe for my honda civic ex 2016. Also planning to buy the high beam from them
customer_reviews.author: Raul

customer_reviews.title: The lights are extremely bright & work great!
customer_reviews.text: Fan housing is to big for a 2010 Tahoe! Had to do some modifications! The lights are extremely bright & work great!
customer_reviews.author: Johnathan Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: used in Cadillac SRX that had me feeling like I was going blind. HUGE difference! So appreciative!
customer_reviews.author: wvgirl

customer_reviews.title: Work Perfectly on my 2013 Dodge RAM!
customer_reviews.text: Great product at a great price. Tried others, had issues. These went in with no CanBus errors (RAM), no flickering, Customer service is VERY responsive. Lights are really bright!
customer_reviews.author: Spicer

customer_reviews.title: Choose right bulb size
customer_reviews.text: So far PERFECT!! WAITING to see what the life is on this product! Fits perfect in my Nissan Altima 2013 SL
customer_reviews.author: Brayan Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Bright!!!
customer_reviews.text: only thing passenger side harder to install due to air filter box . Other than that easy to install. Bonus led used on my license plate very bright good looking as well. Just need high beams now.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Reliable, no replays, no warning up
customer_reviews.text: Great lights, much better and reliable then the cheap HID kits on amazon, I highly recommend these lights I plan on getting a set for another vehicle of mine
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One year bulbs
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these last year did great until last week one dimmed To a dark blue then went out this week. I’ve reached out to the company for the 2 year warranty through the inquiry and email haven’t received a response. But great lights for a year
customer_reviews.author: jeremy edwards

product_meta.title: Glowteck LED Headlight Bulbs Conversion Kit - H11 (H8/H9) Cree XHP50 Chip 12000 Lumens/Pair 68 Watt 6500 Kelvin
feature_bullets: SIZE CHECK - If you are not sure what size led your vehicle requires, please check our accurate fitment tool on the top left as well as ensuring you choose the correct beam as in high or low beam. MAXIMUM LIGHT OUTPUT with the latest CREE XHP50 LED Chip. With 12000 Lumens a pair, well-spread beam pattern and anti-glare body, this led headlight conversion kit offers consistency like never before
AS EASY AS CHANGING A LIGHT BULB. This led head lamp replaces OEM stock bulbs and takes less than 20 minutes to install. Some vehicles require professional installation
ADJUSTABLE BEAM PATTERN allows for reflector or projector housing. This hi lo dual beam led headlight conversion kit suits high beam and low beam assembly, offering crystal clear white beams

UNMATCHED QUALITY AND DESIGN for your jeep wranglers and cars. These led headlight bulbs feature maximum heat dissipation, 40000 hours of shine, AirFLUX dual cooling, a copper core, aviation aluminum coating, copper thermal heatsink and a dual Japanese ball bearing cooling fan
IMPORTANT: Prior to placing your order, at the left corner of your screen, you MUST select your vehicle model, year and high or low beam

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars728 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
